# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  tags unary_funcs.cir DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}UNARYOPS/unary_funcs.cir COMMAND ${XYCE_BINARY} unary_funcs.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}UNARYOPS/unary_funcs.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;valgrind;bsrc")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}UNARYOPS/unary_funcs.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP unary_funcs.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}UNARYOPS/unary_funcs.cir.verify COMMAND ${PERL_BIN} ${XYCE_VERIFY} unary_funcs.cir ${OutputDataDir}/UNARYOPS/unary_funcs.cir.prn unary_funcs.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}UNARYOPS/unary_funcs.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED unary_funcs.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}UNARYOPS/unary_funcs.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;valgrind;bsrc")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}UNARYOPS/unary_funcs.cir COMMAND mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 ${XYCE_BINARY} unary_funcs.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}UNARYOPS/unary_funcs.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;valgrind;bsrc")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}UNARYOPS/unary_funcs.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP unary_funcs.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}UNARYOPS/unary_funcs.cir.verify COMMAND ${PERL_BIN} ${XYCE_VERIFY} unary_funcs.cir ${OutputDataDir}/UNARYOPS/unary_funcs.cir.prn unary_funcs.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}UNARYOPS/unary_funcs.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED unary_funcs.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}UNARYOPS/unary_funcs.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;valgrind;bsrc")
endif()
